name: Coding Studies
desc: This topic is about coding studies: a specific coding practice exercise. First you'll learn how to do them, then see some coding studies in action.

steps.name: Conscious Coding Practice
steps.desc: Coding studies are a specific coding practice exercise, stolen from a profession with a lot more teaching experience than we have. This forty-minute video tells you the what, why and how.

steps.name: A Simple Coding Study: Ivy on a Windowsill
steps.desc: Here's a simple example of how to look at something in the real-world, like an artist, and mimic the interesting features to get better at coding.
